oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Earl Gaines - 2004-03-27 - Second performance of two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Earl Gaines from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 27, 2004. Second performance of two. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Gaines;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Opening comments by Michael Gray. Performances include; Unidentified Instrumental -- Unidentified instrumental possibly The Stroll -- Unidentified Instrumental -- Introduction of Earl Gaines -- Turn On Your Love Light -- Introduction of the band -- I Believe In Your Love -- Hey, Hey I Love You -- The Door Is Still Open -- It's Love Baby (24 Hours A Day) -- Driving Wheel -- Let's Sit And Talk -- Let The Good Times Roll -- When Something Is Wrong With My Baby -- Closing comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gaines, Earl; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
